properties.entry: SELECT ITEM_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME, PRICE, ITEM_NAME FROM ITEM I JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' ORDER BY SALES_VOL DESC
SELECT ITEM_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, PRICE, ITEM_DETAIL, ITEM_CODE FROM ITEM JOIN ITEM_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS='Y' AND ITEM_CODE=?
SELECT NITEM_CODE FROM (SELECT ITEM_CODE+1 NITEM_CODE FROM ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
Insert into HEALTHLIFE.ITEM (ITEM_CODE, CATEGORY_NO, ITEM_NAME, PRICE, SALES_VOL, STATUS, ITEM_DETAIL) values (?, ?, ?, ?,0,'Y', ?);
INSERT INTO ITEM_ATTACHMENT(FILE_CODE, REF_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
